original_text: So on that day all the people there and all Israel knew that the king had no part in the murder of Abner son of Ner.
korean_text: 이 날에야 온 백성과 온 이스라엘이 넬의 아들 아브넬을 죽인 것이 왕이 한 것이 아닌 줄을 아니라

sentences.original_text: So on that day all the people there
that the king had no part
in the murder of Abner son of Ner
